name: Donald J. Trump Foundation
description: The Donald J. Trump Foundation is a New York-based private foundation founded by President Trump. During the 2016 presidential election campaign the foundation's activities came under intense media scrutiny. President Trump attempted to shut the charity down after the 2016 election but was unsuccessful. The New York Attorney General filed a civil lawsuit against those running the organization, including President Trump in June 2018. News organizations also have reported there is a criminal investigation into the foundation.

familyMemberEthics.description: Former director of The Donald J. Trump Foundation, Inc., the current activity status and control structures of which are not reported. The foundation received $150,000 from the Victor Pinchuk Foundation and Yalta European Strategy (YES) — an NGO founded by Mr. Pinchuk — for a video speech Trump made in September 2015.

familyMemberEthics.description: Former director of the non-profit Donald J. Trump Foundation, from January 2006 through January 2017.
